name: Vive Simple - Video Editor
description: I'm all about making awesome videos! I mix footage, tweak audio, and smooth out transitions. With an eye for detail, I turn your ideas into reality with top-notch video recording and killer thumbnail designs, so your content really pops online.

name: Vive Simple - Web Developer
description: I've designed and built the Vive Simple website, and I've completed several projects that you can check out on my GitHub page.
